title: Impact of COVID-19 on celebration of death, mortuary, and funerary customs in Bangladesh: A qualitative study
content:

Author(s): Md Abdur Rahman, Md Redwanul Islam, Monidipa Chowdhury, Md. Asaduzzaman, Proloy Barua, M Atiqul Haque
